pain_point: We're struggling to collect customer feedback consistently after a purchase.
thoughts: Validating clarity of pain point: We're struggling to collect customer feedback consistently after a purchase.

clarifying_questions.question: What methods are you currently using to collect customer feedback post-purchase? (Select all that apply)
What is the primary reason for the inconsistency in feedback collection? (Select one)
options: Low response rates to surveys/feedback requests
Lack of a centralized system for collecting feedback from various channels
Difficulty in analyzing the collected feedback effectively
Insufficient resources (time, personnel) dedicated to feedback collection

clarifying_questions.question: What are your goals for improving customer feedback collection?  (Select all that apply)
options: Increase the volume of feedback received
Improve the quality and actionability of feedback
Gain a better understanding of customer satisfaction
Proactively address customer issues before they escalate
